snippet.title: Vertical Adventure
snippet.description:
Here's a teaser for my latest game, Vertical Adventure. It's a simple 2D plaformer, except you travel... well, vertical. Of course, there's gonna be tiny twist to it, but you probably gonna find out for yourself when it comes out.

Credits:
Co - produce + Game Design + Artwork by Raymond
Co - produce by Lut
Programmer : Ikhwan, Yi Heng, Nicolas
Animation : Kelvin Gun
Music : Adam Alonso
